GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
stmmac: intel: Add a missing clk_disable_unprepare() call in intel_eth_pci_remove()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 9400aeb419d35e718e90aa14a97c11229d0a40bc, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 5ec55823438e850c91c6b92aec93fb04ebde29e2. For more details please see the references link.
